snippet.title: [ Apricity ] - Gameplay Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
APRICITY - A Warm Light In The Dark.

Development Build (Pre-Alpha) - 15/03/24.
Welcome to the Apricity verticle slice.
This is an early look of what gameplay will look like.

The world grows cold, and the walls of your sanctuary begin to crumble under the weight of overwhelming darkness.
Gather soul energy and fortify yourself against sinister forces. Journey to find the light in the shadows, restore the garden and push back the night.

Visit the website for more details.
